namuth 2009 warshayedi nawatha thapal departhamenthuwe paduwa rupiyal miliyana dedahas hayasiyiya (2600) dakwa wadi wiya. 2010 warshayedi mema paduwa rupiyal miliyana thundahasak (3000) wiya. 2011 warshayedi mema paduwa thawaduratath ihala giya athara ee anuwa thapal departhamenthuwa 2011 wasara thuladi labu samastha paduwa rupiyal miliyana thundas harasiyayak (3400) bawata pathwiya.

jawipe sannaddha nayaka saman piyasiri prananduge niyojithayin samanga indrananda athara sakachcha in pasuwa wara gananawak pawathiye boralla suparmarkathi oralosu kade, kota pare pradip stos, maradane abhayasinharamaya, dehiwala saranankara pare matharage don aariyadasage niwasa, moratuwe willorawaththe niwasa, piliyandala hadigama kukul gowipola, narahenpita motar ratha departhamenthuwa, grandpas stediyamgama athulu sthana kihipayakaya.

ema graha gocha­raya thula sala­kime di wruththiya saha raki­raksha kata­yuthu kara­gena yame di witeka sharira widawa ha shari­ra­yata wehesa gathi athi we.

ohu ewara mathiwaranayen wishishta jayagrahanayak da labuwe ya.
amathikama nathi unata passe katawath karadarayak nathuwa jiwathwenna rassawak purudu wenawa athi meya.
kese wethath derana nalikawa magin pawathwanu labana uthsawayak sadaha paminena aya adegana enu labana aduma sambandhayen pahadili kirimak kara thibenawa.
ehew eke, bada daru ammawaru sihi nathi kota maru wena, suthikagare andu bandu tika lok karala yathuru hangana nas nonalata nam, hena hathama gahanna oonaya.
